me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.control

Class SimpleSwerveModuleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.control.AbstractController
      • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.control.AngleDeltaController
        • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.control.SimpleSwerveModuleController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class SimpleSwerveModuleController
extends AngleDeltaController
    The simplest form of control for a swerve module. This class is an extension of the AngleDeltaController class and only provides a single constructor with a single parameter - the coefficient. Higher coefficient values will mean the swerve module will turn faster. Lower coefficient values will mean the swerve module will turn slower. It typically takes some fine tuning to get this right.
    Since:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleSwerveModuleController

        public SimpleSwerveModuleController(double coefficient)
        Create a new SimpleSwerveModuleController.
        Parameters:
        coefficient - the turn speed coefficient. Higher values will make the swerve module turn faster, and lower values will make the swerve module turn slower. This value should almost always be determined experimentally, but a decent place to start is around 0.02.
